name: Bromo Ijen Expedition: 2D/1N
description: Dive into local culture, stunning landscapes, and genuine connections. From waterfalls to sunrise treks and heartfelt local experiences, our carefully curated tour elevates your journey beyond imagination.

plan.title: Pick Up
plan.description: Your journey begins with a pick-up from various Banyuwangi locations - harbor, station, airport, or your hotel at 10:00 am.

plan.title: Waterfall Exploration
plan.description: Embark on an adventure to a mesmerizing waterfall.

plan.title: Coffee and Rubber Plantation
plan.description: Discover the secrets behind local coffee and rubber production.

plan.title: Ricefield Visit
plan.description: Immerse yourself in the picturesque beauty of a traditional rice field.

plan.title: Accommodation
plan.description: Settle into your comfortable local accommodation.

plan.title: Cooking Class
plan.description: Learn the art of crafting local dishes.

plan.title: Dinner with Locals
plan.description: Share a heartfelt dinner with a local family.

plan.title: Community Connection:
plan.description: Visit the homes of older residents and miners, extending support through donations.

plan.title: Restful Night
plan.description: Retire for the night in your cozy abode.

plan.title: Early Morning Adventure
plan.description: Wake up at 2:30 am for an exciting day.

plan.title: Sunrise Trek
plan.description: At 3:00 am, embark on a 1.5-hour drive to the starting point. Begin a trek offering captivating views and a breathtaking sunrise.

plan.title: Lake Vista
plan.description: Witness the sunrise over the lake and savor the enchanting scenery.

plan.title: Return Journey
plan.description: Around 7:00-7:30 am, head back to the starting point.

plan.title: Breakfast
plan.description: Enjoy a hearty breakfast featuring local flavors.

plan.title: Goodbye
plan.description: Drive back to your choice of Banyuwangi location - harbor, airport, station, or hotel.

plan.title: Tour Conclusion
plan.description: Your enriching tour experience concludes.

included.name: Private Transportation
included.description: Enjoy the convenience of a private car for your comfort and ease.

included.name: Pick-Up and Drop-Off
included.description: Seamless transfers to and from Banyuwangi locations - harbor, airport, station, or hotel

included.name: Full Petrol
included.description: Your travel is worry-free with a fully fueled vehicle.

included.name: Entrance Fees
included.description: All entrance fees are covered, including those for the waterfall and the mesmerizing Kawah Ijen

included.name: Accommodation
included.description: One night's stay in cozy local accommodation, immersing you in the heart of the culture.

included.name: Expert Tour Guide
included.description: Your experienced guide will lead you through every step of your journey.

included.name: Dinner and Breakfast
included.description: Savor local flavors with one dinner and one breakfast included.

included.name: Dinner and Breakfast
included.description: Savor local flavors with one dinner and one breakfast included.

included.name: Insurance
included.description: Please arrange for your own travel insurance to ensure a worry-free trip.

name: Bromo Ijen Expedition: 3D/2N
description: Embark on a captivating 3-day, 2-night adventure, immersing yourself in Indonesia's allure. Journey from Surabaya to Madakalipura Waterfall, Bromo, and Ijen, discovering breathtaking landscapes, embracing local culture, and crafting enduring memories.

plan.title: Pick-Up at Surabaya Train Station
plan.description: Your journey begins with a warm welcome at Surabaya's train station between 9:00 and 10:00 a.m.

plan.title: Drive to Cemoro Lawang
plan.description: Embark on a scenic 4-5 hour drive to the charming village of Cemoro Lawang, the final settlement.

plan.title: Village Exploration
plan.description: If time permits, take a leisurely stroll around the village, immersing yourself in its local charm.

plan.title: Early Morning Adventure
plan.description: Wake up at 2:30 am to kickstart your day.

plan.title: Sunrise Jeep Ride
plan.description: Set out on a thrilling Jeep ride to the sunrise point from 3-4 am.

plan.title: Sunrise Spectacle
plan.description: Between 4-6 am, immerse yourself in the captivating sunrise and panoramic vistas.

plan.title: Bromo Exploration
plan.description: By 6 am, return to the Jeep and journey to the sea sand, walking to the iconic Mount Bromo.

plan.title: Hotel Return and Breakfast
plan.description: By 8 am, return to your hotel for a comforting breakfast.

plan.title: Drive to Banyuwangi
plan.description: Depart between 9-9:30 am, beginning a 7-8 hour journey to Banyuwangi's guest house or miner village.

plan.title: Culinary Adventure
plan.description: Engage in a delightful cooking class followed by dinner at the guest house.

plan.title: Early Rise
plan.description: Begin your day with a 2 am wake-up call

plan.title: Journey to Mount Ijen
plan.description: Set off at 2:30 am for a one-hour drive to the captivating Mount Ijen.

plan.title: Ijen Trek
plan.description: Start your trek at 4 am, covering around 3.4 km in 1.5-2 hours.

plan.title: Enchanting Ijen Crater
plan.description: Witness the enchanting Ijen Crater and its ethereal blue flames until 7:30 am.

plan.title: Morning Retreat and Breakfast
plan.description: Return to the village, enjoy breakfast, and relish in the serene morning atmosphere.

plan.title: Cultural Exploration
plan.description: Embark on an immersive journey through a coffee plantation, rice fields, and a picturesque waterfall.

plan.title: Farewell to Banyuwangi
plan.description: Conclude your adventure with a journey to the ferryport as your tour comes to an end.

included.name: Private Transportation
included.description: Enjoy the convenience of a private car for your comfort and ease.

included.name: Pick-Up and Drop-Off
included.description: Seamless transfers to and from Banyuwangi locations - harbor, airport, station, or hotel

included.name: Full Petrol
included.description: Your travel is worry-free with a fully fueled vehicle.

included.name: Entrance Fees
included.description: All entrance fees are covered, including those for the waterfall and the mesmerizing Kawah Ijen

included.name: Accommodation
included.description: One night's stay in cozy local accommodation, immersing you in the heart of the culture.

included.name: Expert Tour Guide
included.description: Your experienced guide will lead you through every step of your journey.

included.name: Dinner and Breakfast
included.description: Savor local flavors with one dinner and one breakfast included.

name: Tumpak Sewu Waterfall - Bromo - Ijen Expedition: 4D/3N
description: Embark on an exhilarating 4-day, 3-night expedition through Indonesia's natural wonders. Traverse from Tumpak Sewu Waterfall to Bromo and Ijen, unveiling stunning landscapes, engaging with local communities, and forging unforgettable memories.

plan.title: Arrival and Welcome
plan.description: Kick off your adventure with a warm arrival in Surabaya or Malang, where we'll extend a hearty welcome around 10:00 am.

plan.title: Journey to Tumpak Sewu
plan.description: Embark on a scenic 5-6 hour drive to an accommodation near the awe-inspiring Tumpak Sewu waterfall.

plan.title: Check-In and Relax
plan.description: Settle into your accommodation and unwind amidst the tranquility of nature's beauty.

plan.title: Explore Tumpak Sewu
plan.description: Start the day with a delicious breakfast and embark on an exciting exploration of the captivating Tumpak Sewu waterfall.

plan.title: Transition to Bromo
plan.description: Bid farewell to Tumpak Sewu and journey to Bromo, where another adventure awaits, taking around 6 hours.

plan.title: Leisure Time
plan.description: Savor a leisurely stroll around Cemoro Lawang or indulge in free activities, absorbing the local ambiance.

plan.title: Bromo Sunrise Trek
plan.description: Rise early for an exhilarating sunrise trek to witness the magical Bromo sunrise.

plan.title: Exploration of Bromo
plan.description: Trek to the iconic Bromo volcano and experience its majestic beauty from up close.

plan.title: Engaging with Local Culture
plan.description: Participate in a cooking class and immerse yourself in local traditions, followed by a heartwarming dinner.

plan.title: Ijen Sunrise Adventure
plan.description: Embark on an early sunrise adventure to Mount Ijen, known for its mesmerizing blue lake.

plan.title: Exploration and Farewell
plan.description: Discover coffee and rubber plantations, visit the stunning Jagir waterfall, and bid farewell to this unforgettable journey.

plan.title: Conclusion of Tour
plan.description: As your adventure concludes, take home cherished memories and the spirit of Indonesia's natural wonders and rich culture.
